content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for coming to see our apartment. We do have it available for rent and we are open to discussing the rental price with you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1000 Euro per month for the 25 square meters apartment.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Ryanah. We appreciate your willingness to rent the apartment at a fair price. We agree to the rental price of 1000 Euros per month for the 25 square meters apartment. We are happy to have you as a tenant and we look forward to your occupancy.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm sorry to hear that you are not interested in renting the apartment at the price of 1000 Euros per month. Thank you for considering our apartment for your housing needs. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We hope to have the opportunity to assist you in the future.
name: Heinrich Heine
